title: why Hong Kongers are protesting? here's an explainer

replies.msg:
To those of you new to this forum, welcome.

Having a section of this website in English is of great help to those that wanted to know more about Hong Kong's protests yet are not proficient in reading Chinese.

Hong Kong's fight is also your fight wherever you are from, because we have become the first place in the world that is standing up against the China Solution offered by the Chinese Government to countries around the world.

Its the fight between:

Rule of Law VS Rule by Law
Free Market Capitalism VS State-led Capitalism
Freedom of speech VS Suppression of speech
Democratic Values VS Dictatorship
Freedom of Religion Vs State-Approved Religion
Diversity Vs Suppression of dissidents
Freedom of press Vs State censorship on Media
Free and Fair Elections Vs Totalitarian Rule
Civil Society Vs Tyranny
Freedom of Information Vs Online censorship
Freedom from Fear Vs Rule by fear
Separation of Powers Vs Collusion of Powers
Checks and Balances Vs Totalitarian Rule
Pluralism Vs Totalitarian Rule

There is simply no middle ground between the above mentioned divides.

Hong Kongers already know how challenging the battle has been, But shall we lose the battle, the Chinese Communist Party would only accelerate exporting their version of worldview around the world.

Hong Kong's fight, is the fight of the values that many of you in the democratic world had fought for in the past, and the opposition this time around is a mighty beast, but we are not surrendering just yet, we are ready to fight til the very end, but we need your help in this almighty battle of David Vs Goliath in the 21st Century.
HongKong's Today, The World's Tomorrow

Glory to Hong Kong
Join Our fight: #StandwithHK 6 Demands not 1 less #Shout4HK
#standwithhongkong

The world should be aware of CCP, it is the one and only political party in China and they are trying to limit the freedom of expression not only in China but everywhere. Human rights are not guaranteed under the power of the CCP.

I counldnt imagine a political power like this is rapidly expanding to everywhere in the world thru their plots: the belt and road initiative, trades, business opportunities, investments, pro-China immigrants, etc. They are trying to grab you and when you get used to them, they will suck your blood dry.

It doesn't matter if you are Hong Konger or not, we all should work together to take down the CCP, especially for those from mainland China, stand up and fight for your rights! The political party does not necessarily represent China, people do. It could be tough, in life what you really want will never come easy isnt it? Act now before its too late.

Five demands, not one less.
Fight for freedom, stand with Hong Kong
NO ONE LESS
And I invite all users to participate discussions here too, practicing a language is the only way to improving it.
Revive Hong Kong, the Revolution of our times
